data.text: @NAEmmanuele The whole pretend this didn't happen really gets to me as well.
@NAEmmanuele I'm happy to be back in schools and seeing teachers and students, but still worried about everyone's state of mind. What you're doing isn't easy!
@beritgordon I hope you’re doing well, Berit!
@NAEmmanuele Back to "normal" is definitely a questionable concept! Although it is lovely to see your face:)
@NAEmmanuele Doubling down on the old ways of doing things. 😔
@Mr_Jon_Winkle I think individual teachers made change, but I’m not sure I’ve heard enough stories of districts or systems leaning into equitable and lasting changes.
@NAEmmanuele So many lessons learned during the pandemic.  It is my hope that we see true reform come from this experience, so I agree with your tweet and feelings behind it.
@Eric_McGuyer I’m not sure I have answers. But I fear the questions about equitable access, student seat time, effective use of technology, etc. will fade away…
